participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Active, friendly, and health-oriented. Enjoys outdoor activities and maintaining fitness.
participant_1.background: i have short hair. two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Passionate, creative, and sociable. Loves sharing music and stories from his travels.
participant_2.background: i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. we spent summers ring at national parks. i started playing guitar when i was three. i grew up in the industry.
